mapper.select: SELECT a.center_id,b.branchname AS centerName, a.wkgrp_id AS workGroupId,e.name AS workGroupName, a.qy, a.autoprint_typeid as autoPrintTypeId, a.f_del,a.ins_date,a.ins_time,a.ins_user_id,a.ins_func_id,a.ins_ope_id, a.upd_date,a.upd_time,a.upd_user_id,a.upd_func_id,a.upd_ope_id FROM centralkitchen.mt_instruct_auto_print a LEFT JOIN centralkitchen.branches b ON a.center_id = b.branchcd AND b.isclosed = 0 LEFT join centralkitchen.mt_productwkgrp e ON a.center_id = e.center_id AND a.wkgrp_id = e.id AND e.f_del = 0 WHERE a.qy != 0 AND a.qy is not null AND a.f_del = 0 AND a.center_id = #{centerId} AND a.autoprint_typeid = #{autoPrintTypeId} ORDER BY a.wkgrp_id

SELECT center_id, param_id, line_id, param_val1, param_val2, param_val3, param_val4, param_val5, memo, f_del, ins_date, ins_time, ins_user_id, ins_func_id, ins_ope_id, upd_date, upd_time, upd_user_id, upd_func_id, upd_ope_id FROM centralkitchen.mt_center_line_anyfield WHERE center_id = #{centerId} AND param_id = 10 AND f_del = 0 AND param_val1 <> '0' AND param_val1 IS NOT NULL
